Reference

Climate

get_climate()

Extract climate data of TerraClimate

get_etp()

Extract evapotranspiration data of Modis

Enviroment

get_co()

Extract Carbon Monoxide data of Sentinel5

get_no2()

Extract Nitrogen Dioxide data of Sentinel5

get_o3()

Extract Ozone data of Sentinel5

get_so2()

Extract Ozone data of Sentinel5

get_aero()

Extract Aerosol index (UVAI) data of Sentinel5

get_vegetation()

Extract vegetation index of MODIS

Human intervention

get_ghm()

Extract Global Human Modification data

get_pop()

Extract population data of WorldPop

get_urban()

Extract urban area data of MODIS Landcover

get_nlv1()

Extract Night time light data

get_nlv2()

Extract Night time light data

get_def()

Extract deforestation area data from Hansen

Census data

get_od_data()

Get census-like data in a origin-destination format

Graphics

show_pal()

Show a set of palette color Lab

scale_color_innova()

Color scale constructor for lis colors

scale_fill_innova()

Fill scale constructor for lis colors

innova_pal()

Return function to interpolate a lis color palette

Administrative limit

gen_admin_div()

Create categories for adiministrative divisions (Peru)

Vulnerability

vulnerability_index()

Vulnerability Index

Utils

allpautils_names()

Remove accents and hyphens in character vector

read_batch()

Utility for dataset batch importing in multiple formats

pol_as_ee()

Polygon to earth engine

export()

Export CSV file to MongoDB

Dataset

Peru

Peru names and spatial

migration17raw

Raw migration data from the Peru census of 2017
